content: उद्दाम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unbound, unrestrained, unchecked, free, bold; <ls>Śi. 4. 10.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) Strong, powerful, violent; <ls>Pt. 3. 148</ls>; <ls>Māl. 3. 7</ls>; °देहपरिदाहमहाज्वराणि <ls n="Māl.">6. 13.</ls> ({%b%}) Furious, intoxicated; स्रोतस्युद्दामदिग्गजे <ls>R. 1. 78</ls>; <ls>Śi. 11. 19</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Dreadful, formidable; °शरीरसंनिवेशः <ls>Māl. 3.</ls> {@--4@} Self-willed. {@--5@} Luxuriant, large, great, excessive; <ls>Me. 25</ls>; उद्दामोत्कलिकां <ls>Ratn. 2. 4</ls>, <ls n="Ratn.">4. 22</ls>; गंधोद्दामा धरा exhaling great smell <ls>Mk. 5. 22.</ls> {@--6@} Proud, haughty; पौलस्त्यविजयोद्दाम <ls>Mv. 3. 45</ls> elated. {@--7@} Unlimited, extraordinary. --मः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Yama. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Varuṇa. --मं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Violently, fiercely, strongly; अद्योद्दामं ज्वलिष्यतः <ls>U. 3. 9.</ls>
